mean_cn: n. 交通指挥灯，红绿灯
mean_en: Traffic lights are sets of red, amber, and green lights at the places where roads meet. They control the traffic by signalling when vehicles have to stop and when they can go. Traffic lights can also be referred to as a traffic light
short_phrase: red, yellow, and green traffic lights
sentence: The traffic lights ensure the safety of traffic participants.
sentence_trans: 红绿灯保证了交通参与者的安全。
